issue.title: [CF 692] Hide Icon Border
issue.body:
Hello i wanted to ask if it is possible to hide the border of an icon ? I want to use the aura graphics of power aura classic but the border is annoying ;)
Thanks for this great addon


> Posted by CurseForge user supersurfer1234 | Imported from CurseForge issue #692 | Raw

comments.body:
It sounds like you are taking about the border that is provided by Masque. Just go into your Masque settings and disable skinning for the group that you wish to hide the border for.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

yes you are completly right Cybeloras, sorry i did not know that it was masque. thanks and keep up the fantastic work :)


> Posted by CurseForge user supersurfer1234
